question: Question_01_(n)
statement:
Find an approximation to $(7.5)^{1/3}$ by using the linear approximation
to $f(x) = x^{1/3}$ at $a = 8$. Give your answer as a fraction, $p/q$,
in lowest terms.
hints:
What is the definition of the linear approximation to a function $f(x)$
at the point $a$?

The linear approximation, $L(x)$, to a function, $f(x)$, at the point
$a$, is given by

\begin{align*}\displaystyle
L(x) = f(a) + f'(a)(x - a).\end{align*}
